Articles.Content: Can we delete accounts? More importantly, can I delete my account?

No, you cannot delete your own account. Administrators can delete accounts, but I am uncertain as to whether they do it. Not sure what the policy is on that, actually. Give it a day or two and Sal'll probably come by and give you a run-down on it. Alternatively, PM one of the admins, or KasperVld, or Sal_vager, or Rowsdower, to ask about it directly.
Plus, Spaceport is due to shut down next week in any case
